text: It was quite surprising to discover the Russian Embassy during my walk.  Considering the significant distance between Singapore and Russia, it's rather unexpected to see their diplomatic representation here. 🙂

I had an exceptional experience with the Russian Consulate in Singapore. Despite the urgency of my situation – having my passport stolen on January 1st – they efficiently processed the required documents within a day, enabling my swift return to the country. Their prompt and professional service surpassed my expectations, and I am grateful for their invaluable assistance.

The customer service is awesome. I needed to apply for new Russian passports for my children. The whole procedure was very easy and hassle free. Not only I got the passports within days, we also got a personalized congratulatory speech for my 10-year-old son who came to the Embassy with me to collect his passport. It was a very pleasant experience.
Super helpful and friendly team😊 I’d give them more than 5-stars🌟 Felt like at home❤️🇷🇺🙏 Perhaps the most efficient government entity I saw inside & outside of Russia (been to UK, HK, UAE etc.)!
Very happy with the Embassy officer, polite and good. Remember the entrance gate is no. 53, make appointment before you come down.
